useCase.name: Send Offer Message
useCase.description: A user sends an offer message to a source.

successEndConditions.condition: Source receives and responds to the offer message properly.

failureEndConditions.condition: Source fails to receive the offer message or respond adequately.

useCase.trigger: User enables sending an offer message.

mainSequence.step: User clicks "LinkTo" option from the interface.
Source is linked to the target.
Source offers message (1) to the target.
Source offers message (2) to the target.
The target postpones the message processing.
